mapper.select: select did, dtitle,dplace,dprice,dinformation,dtime,dtarget,dnum,dfile,dsfile,dstart,dend,TRUNC(TO_DATE(dend, 'YY-MM-DD') - SYSDATE)+1 ENDDATE,dentertime,dcode,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where did=#{did}

select dt.dtitle,dt.dplace,dt.dprice, dr.rdate,dr.RTOTAL,rallprice from dmu_ticket DT , dmu_reservation DR where dt.did = dr.did and dr.rid= (select rid from (select rid from dmu_reservation order by rokdate desc) where rownum = 1)

select dt.dsfile, dt.dtitle, dt.dplace, dr.rid, dr.rdate, dr.rtotal, dr.rallprice from dmu_ticket DT, dmu_reservation DR where dt.did = dr.did and dr.rid= (select rid from (select rid from dmu_reservation order by rokdate desc) where rownum = 1)
